interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Boho Wide Headband with Button, Stretchy Elastic Ear Saver Knotted Headwear Sport Athletic Yoga Gym Head Wrap Hair Accessories for Women,Youth(Type D)
Review Date: 2021/05/04
Store: Heybe
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Material': 'Cloth', 'Fabric Type': 'Elastic', 'Brand': 'Heybe', 'Item Form': 'Wrap', 'Unit Count': '3.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '11.02 x 7.87 x 0.59 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'UPC': '782500152327'}
Review Text: These are nice quality and variety, and the buttons hopefully will hold up and help out aching ears. But these aren't really giftable. I got these for someone who was complaining about ear aches from wearing masks all day, and they looked at them and went, "huh?" No directions, no picture of someone wearing them, just a plastic packet with the words "headbands with buttons". I shouldn't have to explain this. Just a picture of someone wearing these included in the packaging would be perfect, but don't be surprised if you get these as a gift for someone and find they're not using the buttons for their intended purpose.
Review Title: Good variety, but no directions.
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Pine Gel Nail Polish Set Chameleon Shimmering Color and Black 7.5 ml LED UV Cured Soak Off Nail Gel for Nail Art Manicure
pine
{'Brand': 'Pine', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Liquid Volume': '0.25 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '4.96 x 3.7 x 2.91 inches; 9.14 Ounces', 'UPC': '738628890993'}
These are fun colors. I love that each bottle has the color at the top of the cap. So often it's hard to find the color you're looking for. I got a couple of sets from this company, and they're all quality.
Love the colors, and that each bottle has the color on the top of the cap.
Gel Nail Polish Set, Glitter 6 Colors Gel Polish Kit Popular Nail Art Design Soak Off LED Lamp Nail Polish Gel Manicure Kit Gifts Set for Girls Women Professional DIY Home Use
Anzuo
{'Brand': 'Anzuo', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Number of Pieces': '6', 'Product Dimensions': '5.12 x 3.15 x 3.54 inches; 10.23 Ounces'}
These are fun colors; I'd say more New Years Eve party than Xmas. I like that it comes with stickers to mark the top of the caps, but I wish each bottle had the color at the top of the cap already, since it can take some time for the polish to dry. I guess you could write it down? So often it's hard to find the color you're looking for. I got a couple of sets from this company, and they're all quality.
Love the colors, more New Years Eve party than Xmas. Would have preferred color already on cap.
Organic Sweet Almond Oil and Fractionated Coconut Oil Bundle for Hair and Skin, 100% Pure and Natural, Hexane-Free, Moisturizing, For Healthy Skin, Silky Hair, Multiuse Body Oil, 16 fl. Oz X 2
Shiny Leaf
{'Brand': 'Shiny Leaf', 'Scent': 'Almond Oil and Fractionated Coconut', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Unit Count': '32.00 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '8.62 x 5.04 x 2.48 inches; 2.23 Pounds', 'UPC': '781584950669'}
As another reviewer said, in much better detail so I'll keep my review brief, the coconut oil being refined does nothing for skincare. I assume the other is in the same boat, despite being unrefined. Which is a shame, since that is what I got them for. Oh well, partly my fault I guess for not reading the fine print.
Wish I'd seen "refined" before selecting.
8 PCS 40ML Mini Spray Bottles, FANDAMEI Fine Mist Plastic Spray Bottles, Empty Refillable Clear Atomizer for Cleaning, Travel, Essential Oils, Perfume, Makeup Liquids. Travel Size, Pink & Blue
Fandamei
{'Brand': 'Fandamei', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Capacity': '40 Milliliters', 'Number of Items': '8', 'Special Feature': 'Mist Spray', 'Package Dimensions': '8.46 x 5.79 x 1.42 inches; 5.93 Ounces'}
Excellent travel size, sturdy enough to withstand travel. Good price. The two colors make it a little easier for organization.
Sturdy, compact spray bottles.
Heyedrate Activated Charcoal Soap Bar and Face Wash | Organic, Vegan, Natural Soap made with Dead Sea Mud and Our Essential Oil Blend (1 Pack (5 Ounces))
Eye Love
{'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Brand': 'Eye Love', 'Scent': 'Eucalyptus, Coconut, Grapefruit, Rosemary', 'Material Feature': 'Organic, Natural, Vegan', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '4 x 1 x 1 inches; 4.97 Ounces', 'UPC': '850436007827'}
I like the ingredients, not super in love with the scent, but it's faint and doesn't linger, so no problem really. This worked up a good lather, not the best, but better than others with a washcloth; the lather didn't disappear either so I didn't need to keep going back to the soap. It's a nice size, larger than others I've tried, and seems like it will last at least a week, probably longer. Non-daily use it could last much longer. As far as moisturizing, I can at least say it didn't dry me out, which is a plus.
Faint scent doesn't linger, good lather.
Scrunchie Holder Stands with 8 Pack Large Size Scrunchies - Acrylic Hair Ties Organizer for Teenage Girls and VSCO Girls Gift Stuff
Beeager
{'Color': 'Yellow,Gray,White', 'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Item Form': 'Scrunchie', 'Brand': 'Beeager', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Package Dimensions': '10.55 x 3.98 x 3.7 inches; 10.86 Ounces'}
A scrunchy stand is a great idea. The company went the extra distance here to include a nice assortment of scrunchies to go with it. Would make a great gift for someone. Comes in a nice cardboard box.
Nice variety, giftable.

These are nice quality and variety, and the buttons hopefully will hold up and help out aching ears. But these aren't really giftable. I got these for someone who was complaining about ear aches from wearing masks all day, and they looked at them and went, "huh?" No directions, no picture of someone wearing them, just a plastic packet with the words "headbands with buttons". I shouldn't have to explain this. Just a picture of someone wearing these included in the packaging would be perfect, but don't be surprised if you get these as a gift for someone and find they're not using the buttons for their intended purpose.
Good variety, but no directions.
profile:
**User Preference Summary:**

- **Product Preference**: The user continues to favor gel nail polish sets with vibrant colors for special occasions while exploring hair and skin products. Their recent purchase of a headband with practical features indicates an expanding interest in functional accessories that address specific needs, particularly in fitness or daily comfort.

- **Aesthetic Values**: The user emphasizes practicality and effective design in their beauty items, valuing thoughtful details and usability. Their recent experience with a new hair accessory highlights a trend towards selecting products that enhance daily routines while remaining stylish.

- **Quality Awareness**: The user prioritizes high-quality, effective products, evident in their mixed experience with the latest purchase. While they appreciate variety and quality, dissatisfaction with packaging and presentation suggests a need for clarity and enhancement in product communication.

- **Conscious Choices**: The user maintains a commitment to non-toxic, cruelty-free, and organic options, integrating ethical considerations seamlessly into their selections, reinforcing their dedication to responsible consumerism.

- **Engagement Style**: Demonstrating loyalty to trusted brands, the user assesses product specifications and reviews carefully. Their recent feedback indicates a focus on usability and the importance of packaging for a better user experience, balancing quality, functionality, and ethical values in their purchasing decisions.

Overall, the user continues to seek practical, aesthetically pleasing, and ethically responsible beauty products, with a growing interest in organized and functional accessories that cater to specific lifestyle needs.
